page_content:
2022 Corporate Responsibility and Sustainability Report
Governance 
Our Board of Directors has a strong commitment to corporate responsibility and accountability. 
Community-focused and with a breadth and diversity of experience, board members bring strong effective oversight in their service to MGE and MGE Energy.
This report includes forward-looking statements and estimates of future performance that may differ from actual results because of 
uncertainties and risks encountered in day-to-day business.
